title: Remove Oregon flower decorative section from Home page

requirements.summary: Remove the four non-interactive Oregon flower decorative images from the Home page decorative background layer so they no longer render.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the decorative background layer no longer includes any elements referencing: /assets/generated/ls-oregon-flower-oak.dim_512x512.png, /assets/generated/ls-oregon-flower-oregon-grape.dim_512x512.png, /assets/generated/ls-oregon-flower-camas.dim_512x512.png, /assets/generated/ls-oregon-flower-trillium.dim_512x512.png.
The rest of the Home page layout (header, details cards, flyer image, and CTA buttons) remains unchanged aside from the removed decorations.
No console errors are introduced on the Home page due to the removed elements.

file_operations.description: Delete the four aria-hidden elements under the "New Oregon flower decorations" comment so the Oregon flower decorations no longer render, keeping the rest of the decorative layer and page layout unchanged.
